post.body: As you walk into the shopping center, for each sign that says "sale" you have to drink.
Agreed!
Every 30 minutes may not be enough. Do you get a head start to establish the base buzz? Like a lightening round?
You are crazy thin for someone who eats the crap you do!
I was on board with the goat cheese lasagna part until I got to "hospital." Mighty drugs must have been involved ... yech!
Oh you inspire me. The death sticks alone make me feel a little purge-y :)
Madness! $25? The photog who took it probably get's paid half that! That just depressed me. Maybe if you can get it on a mug ...
I've seen it. My point was that it wasn't what I thought of when I think of the "Badges" quote. Now stop yelling at me!
No. I won't. I hate westerns. They make me fall asleep. Kind of like football. It comes on and I immediately go into nap mode.
Eastwood singing a ballad through the woods? Priceless.
I'm female and under 40 ... the fact that I've seen "Paint Your Wagon" is astounding enough.
I know it is from an older western film ... but MY memory of it is from Blazing Saddles.
I also say "Hep meh! Hep meh!" but no one gets that either. It's a dismal day when no one acknowledges my Mel Brooks humor.
Popcorn counts as healthy, right?

The Traditional Houses are Sinking: Who are the big traditional publishing companies anyway?
Picador. TOR. Farr.. http://tinyurl.com/6wl2ob
Inspired by this author http://budurl.com/26bh and my co-workers, I'm watching my foodal intake. Maybe will even attempt a crunch!
Are you a cruceverbalist? We just posted up a cool book of common (not common?) clues for crossword puzzles. http://budurl.com/6suu
Coffee!
You can admire my lovely badge design at Hastings in Sierra Vista tomorrow! Here's a map! http://budurl.com/xdry
RT @mikecane: What a great day to play outside! http://tinyurl.com/45c9o9
